name: Vex
stunts: Master Planner: +2 to Create Advantage when planning a heist or casing a location
Quickfingers: +2 to Burglary when picking pockets or lifting small items
Urban Acrobat: +2 to Athletics when moving through city environments
notes: Vex is a veteran member of the Thieves Guild, an Imperial woman with exceptional skill in planning and executing heists. She's frustrated by the guild's recent string of bad luck but remains fiercely loyal to the organization. She handles jobs in the major cities and works as a fence for stolen goods. Vex is abrasive and sarcastic, especially to new recruits, but respects competence and skill. She eventually becomes a key ally in exposing Mercer's betrayal.
combat_tactics: Vex avoids direct combat, preferring to use stealth and misdirection. If cornered, she uses hit-and-run tactics and environmental advantages. She always has an escape plan.
social_interaction: Vex is sharp-tongued, sarcastic, and doesn't suffer fools. She's dismissive of new recruits until they prove themselves. Despite her abrasive exterior, she cares deeply about the guild and respects those who show skill and dedication. She's practical and focused on results.

relationships.Mercer Frey: Guild Master, professional relationship (unaware of betrayal)
relationships.Karliah: Former guild member (believes traitor story initially)

personality_notes.speaking_style: Sarcastic, direct, uses slang. Often dismissive of incompetence.
personality_notes.character_growth: Learns to trust new recruits and eventually helps expose Mercer's betrayal

story_hooks: Assigns city influence jobs to expand guild operations
Provides intel and planning for major heists
Becomes key ally in guild's restoration

dialogue_samples.greeting: What do you want? I'm busy.
dialogue_samples.job_assignment: I've got work if you're not too green to handle it. Don't screw it up.
dialogue_samples.respect_earned: Not bad. Maybe you're not completely useless after all.
dialogue_samples.guild_loyalty: This guild is my life. I'll do whatever it takes to see it restored.
